## Publish

- [ ] Create video + [image thumbnail](https://www.figma.com/design/GsHY2OGkxXmlcKhREfaKY0/ScanGov-brand-assets?node-id=0-1&t=GM82sxHYJQVR3DT2-1)
- [ ] upload [video](https://www.youtube.com/@scangov)
- [ ] Update `features.json`
